info.name: 🖥️ Proxmox VE + Apache Guacamole — Complete API Collection
info.description:
Full API collection for:

• Proxmox VE at 192.168.101.1:8006 (root@pam)
• Apache Guacamole at 192.168.1.135 (guacadmin)

Covers: auth, VMs, containers, storage, cluster, users, permissions, all 5 protocols, session management, sharing profiles, user groups, history, and schema endpoints.

**Quick Start:** Run 1.1 (Proxmox Login) and 7.1 (Guacamole Login) first — they auto-save tokens.

request.description: Authenticates root@pam and stores PVE_TICKET + PVE_CSRF for the rest of the collection.
Creates token 'postman' for root@pam. The one-time secret is stored in PVE_API_TOKEN_SEC.

item.name: 1.7 Test API Token Auth → List Nodes

request.description: Creates VMID 999 as a disposable test VM.
Creates a disabled NFS storage entry. disable=1 prevents auto-mount.

item.name: 6.17 Grant Group Access to All Resources

request.description: Creates a VNC connection pointing to Proxmox host. Updates GUAC_CONN_ID.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Postman — SSH (Key Auth)",
  "parentIdentifier": "ROOT",
  "protocol": "ssh",
  "parameters": {
    "hostname": "192.168.101.1",
    "port": "22",
    "username": "root",
    "password": "",
    "private-key": "-----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----\n...\n-----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----",
    "passphrase": "",
    "font-name": "monospace",
    "font-size": "12",
    "enable-sftp": "true"
  },
  "attributes": {}
}
